name: Boton AI
description: BOTON is an AI-powered platform revolutionizing content creation and community engagement for crypto projects, especially meme coins. Projects integrate BOTON's custom AI bots into their Telegram groups, enabling community members to quickly generate branded content like memes, enhancing engagement cost-effectively. Every memecoin spends thousand of dollars on deployment, marketing and listings but they forget about the art, art is something what a memecoin can make or break. Boton creates art for a fraction of a price of a designer!
